name: organizationally
content:
organizationally adverb
(RELATING TO A SYSTEM)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the way that the different parts of something are combined or work together: It is organisationally impractical for the same department to manage both shipping and marketing. We need an organizationally flexible solution.
More examplesFewer examplesThe two departments are organizationally distinct and rarely need to interact with one another.

organizationally adverb
(RELATING TO A GROUP)
in a way that relates to an organization or group : If we are going to move forward organisationally, we need to learn to communicate with each other more effectively. The company has taken steps organizationally to protect its computer network and the sensitive information stored on it.
